means: 狮子座的一等星，（熔矿中产生的）金属渣

sentence.Network_en: Regulus is the brightest star in the constellation Leo.
sentence.Network_cn: 轩辕十四是狮子座中最亮的星星.

sentence.Network_en: Silvery - blue Regulus may look pinkish in the twilight.
sentence.Network_cn: 银蓝色的轩辕十四在暮色里有一点点浅桃色.

sentence.Network_en: Regulus was the younger brother of Sirius Black.
sentence.Network_cn: 雷古勒斯是小天狼星布莱克的弟弟.

derivation.yuyuan_name: late 16th cent.: from Latin, diminutive of rex, reg- 'king'; originally in the phrase regulus of antimony (denoting metallic antimony), apparently so named because of its readiness to combine with gold

means.word_mean: 2. a genus of birds of the family Sylviidae including kinglets
